summary: AN ORDINANCE submitting a proposition to the qualified electors of the City of Seattle, at the general election to be held on November 2, 1999, to amend Article IV, Section 9 of the Charter of the City of Seattle to allow for the re-enactment or amendment of uncodified ordinances by setting forth in full the section or subsection being amended, as is already allowed by State law for ordinances that have become part of the Municipal Code; ratifying and confirming prior acts; calling on the City Clerk to certify the proposed amendment to the Director of Records and Elections of King County and directing such Director to submit the proposition to City voters; and providing for the publication of such proposed amendment.
